title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: Labor MP Clare O'Neil says Anthony Albanese’s vision statement in Perth on Tuesday gave “so much encouragement about the direction that Labor is going to take coming into this term of parliament”. Ms O’Neil told Sky News Labor’s central purpose was focussed on jobs, but there were currently “two million Australians that want to be in more work but aren’t able to find it”. The Labor MP said climate change was often framed as a “dispute between the environment and work, but this is incorrect”. “We can tackle climate change and create many decent jobs for Australians,” she said. Image: News Corp Australia
